title: SseEnvelope
description: Wrapper for Server-Sent Events data field. Java: SseEnvelope<T>, NestJS: SSE MessageEvent.data, Python: EventSourceResponse event data. Each SSE event's `data` field MUST be a JSON string conforming to this schema.

type.description: Event type identifier. MUST match the SSE event name.

data.description: Event payload. null for heartbeat events.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of when the event was emitted
